mapper.select: select max(domain) from t_domain WHERE type = 1

select d.id,d.domain, d.type, st.server_addr serverAddr from t_domain d left join t_server_tunnel st on st.id = d.server_tunnel_id where d.user_id = #{userId} and d.type=#{type} and d.id not in (select DISTINCT IFNULL(domain_id,0) from t_device_mapping where userId = #{userId})
